headline: Ohio Republican, Democratic parties respond to 2022 State of the State
author: Fletcher Keel
sentences: "Governor DeWine, Lieutenant Governor Husted and the Ohio General Assembly have delivered on their promises to the people of Ohio, and today's State of the State address clearly outlined a bright and vibrant future for working families and businesses thanks to their strong, conservative leadership," said Ohio Republican Party Chairman Bob Paduchik.
“Amid all of the bombast and bluster Ohioans heard from Mike DeWine today, what we failed to hear is any plan for him to do his job and fix the redistricting mess he created.
The election chaos we’re seeing in Ohio falls squarely at the feet of Mike DeWine and Republicans on the redistricting commission who failed time and again to pass fair maps.

COLUMBUS, Ohio —
Moments after the conclusion of Mike DeWine's 2022 State of the State Address, the Ohio Democratic and Republican parties released statements in response.
Today, Ohio Democrats are once again calling on DeWine and his fellow Republicans to do their jobs and pass fair maps,” said Chair Liz Walters.
Ohioans are sick and tired of words, it’s time for action.
